creditline: Gift of Marc Leo Felix in memory of Belle Cloth Maurer
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: mixed techniques of pile cloth, embroidery and cordage; central red field of double diamond design; bordered on three sides by geometric black and white patterns; rounded at two corners; one short end unfinished
markings: \'BULAPE-IU (Cut off)\', at verso border unfinished end in pencil
title: Skirt Panel
